title: T206 Carolina Bright Evers - For Sale
author: David R

posts.post_title: T206 Carolina Bright Evers - For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have an Evers Carolina Brights on eBay (see link below) that I would be interested in trading for another hall of famer with one of the following backs:
Hindu, Piedmont 42, Broadleaf, Lenox, Uzit, or Cycle 460

Please contact me if interested.


 [url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=230539955500&ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT[/url]
